00065     // PR  DIR SRC             DEST          STATE                   AGE      EXP      PKTS BYTES
00066     // tcp In  10.0.0.11:55802 10.0.0.254:22 ESTABLISHED:ESTABLISHED 00:48:37 24:00:00 4198 584448
00067     private $re_Pftop= "/^\s*(\S+)\s+(\S+)\s+(\S+)\s+(\S+)\s+(\S+)\s+(\S+)\s+(\S+)\s+(\d+)\s+(\d+)$/";

00069     function Pf()
00070     {
00071         global $VIEW_PATH, $TCPDUMP;
00072         
00073         parent::Model();
00074         
00075         $this->PNRG_IMG_DIR= $VIEW_PATH.'pmacct/pnrg/spool/';
00076         
00077         $this->PF_PATH= $VIEW_PATH.'pf';
00078         
00079         $re_days= '(\*|[0-7,]*)';
00080         $re_hour= '(\d+)';
00081         $re_min= '(\d+)';
00082 
00083         $re= "$re_min\s+$re_hour\s+\*\s+\*\s+$re_days\s+\/sbin\/pfctl -a AfterHours -f \/etc\/pf\.conf\.afterhours";
00084         $this->re_BusinessDays= "^$re$";
00085         $this->re_DisabledBusinessDays= "^#$re$";
00086 
00087         $re= "$re_min\s+$re_hour\s+\*\s+\*\s+$re_days\s+\/sbin\/pfctl -a AfterHours -Fr";
00088         $this->re_Flush= "^$re$";
00089         $this->re_DisabledFlush= "^#$re$";
00090 
00091         $re= "\*\s+\*\s+\*\s+\*\s+$re_days\s+\/sbin\/pfctl -a AfterHours -f \/etc\/pf\.conf\.afterhours";
00092         $this->re_Holidays= "^$re$";
00093         $this->re_DisabledHolidays= "^#$re$";

00098             $this->Commands,

00232 
00233     function IsRunning($proc= '')
00234     {
00235         $output= $this->RunShellCommand('/sbin/pfctl -s info');
00236         if (preg_match('/Status:\s*(Enabled|Disabled)\s*/', $output, $match)) {
00237             return ($match[1] == 'Enabled');
00238         }
00239         return FALSE;
00240     }
00241 
00244     function Start()
00245     {
00246         return $this->RunShellCommand('/sbin/pfctl -e');
00247     }
00248 
00251     function Stop()
00252     {
00253         return $this->RunShellCommand('/sbin/pfctl -d');
00254     }
00255 
00261     function GetStateCount($re= '')
00262     {
00263         // Skip header lines by grepping for In or Out
00264         // Empty $re is not an issue for grep, greps all
00265         $cmd= "$this->pftopCmd | /usr/bin/egrep -a 'In|Out'";
00266         if ($re !== '') {
00267             $re= escapeshellarg($re);
00268             $cmd.= " | /usr/bin/grep -a -E $re";
00269         }
00270         $cmd.= ' | /usr/bin/wc -l';
00271         exec($cmd, $output, $retval);
00272         // OpenBSD wc returns with leading blanks
00273         return trim($this->RunShellCommand($cmd));
00274     }
00275 
00283     function GetStateList($end, $count, $re= '')
00284     {
00285         // Skip header lines by grepping for In or Out
00286         // Empty $re is not an issue for grep, greps all
00287         $re= escapeshellarg($re);
00288         $cmd= "$this->pftopCmd | /usr/bin/egrep -a 'In|Out' | /usr/bin/grep -a -E $re | /usr/bin/head -$end | /usr/bin/tail -$count";
00289         exec($cmd, $output, $retval);
00290         if ($retval === 0) {
00291             return serialize($this->ParsePftop($output));
00292         }
00293         ViewError(implode("\n", $output));
00294         cwc_syslog(LOG_DEBUG, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'Failed running pftop');
00295         return FALSE;
00296     }
00297 
00303     function ParsePftop($pftopout)
00304     {
00305         $states= array();
00306         foreach ($pftopout as $line) {
00307             if (preg_match($this->re_Pftop, $line, $match)) {
00308                 $states[]= array(
00309                     $match[1],
00310                     $match[2],
00311                     $match[3],
00312                     $match[4],
00313                     $match[5],
00314                     $match[6],
00315                     $match[7],
00316                     $match[8],
00317                     $match[9],
00318                     );
00319             }
00320         }
00321         return $states;
00322     }
00323 
00326     function SetIfs($lanif, $wanif)
00327     {
00328         $retval= $this->SetNVP($this->PfRulesFile, 'int_if', '"'.$lanif.'"');
00329         $retval&= $this->SetNVP($this->PfRulesFile, 'ext_if', '"'.$wanif.'"');
00330         $retval&= $this->SetNVP($this->PfRulesFile, 'proxy', '"'.$wanif.'"');
00331         return $retval;
00332     }

00339     }

00350     function ApplyPfRules()
00351     {
00352         return $this->RunShellCommand("/sbin/pfctl -f $this->PfRulesFile");
00353     }

00357     function GetHostGraphsList($ip)
00358     {
00359         global $Re_Ip;
00360 
00361         $iplist= array();
00362         
00363         $dh= opendir($this->PNRG_IMG_DIR);
00364         while (FALSE !== ($filename= readdir($dh))) {
00365             if (preg_match("/^($Re_Ip)\.cgi$/", $filename, $match)) {
00366                 $iplist[]= $match[1];
00367             }
00368         }
00369         closedir($dh);
00370         
00371         sort($iplist);
00372         
00373         if (in_array($ip, $iplist)) {
00374             $this->RunShellCommand($this->PNRG_IMG_DIR.$ip.'.cgi');
00375         }
00376         else if (count($iplist) > 0) {
00377             $this->RunShellCommand($this->PNRG_IMG_DIR.$iplist[0].'.cgi');
00378         }
00379         
00380         return implode("\n", $iplist);
00381     }

00400     {
00401         return $this->RunShellCommand('/sbin/pfctl -a AfterHours -sr');

00403 
00406     function GetAfterHours()
00407     {
00408         if (($contents= $this->GetCrontab()) !== FALSE) {
00409             if (preg_match("/$this->re_BusinessDays/ms", $contents, $match)) {
00410                 $businessdaysdisabled= FALSE;
00411             }
00412             else if (preg_match("/$this->re_DisabledBusinessDays/ms", $contents, $match)) {
00413                 $businessdaysdisabled= TRUE;
00414             }
00415             $endmin= sprintf('%02d', $match[1]);
00416             $endhour= sprintf('%02d', $match[2]);
00417             $businessdays= explode(',', $match[3]);
00418 
00419             if (preg_match("/$this->re_Holidays/ms", $contents, $match)) {
00420                 $holidaysdisabled= FALSE;
00421             }
00422             else if (preg_match("/$this->re_DisabledHolidays/ms", $contents, $match)) {
00423                 $holidaysdisabled= TRUE;
00424             }
00425             $holidays= explode(',', $match[1]);
00426 
00427             if (preg_match("/$this->re_Flush/ms", $contents, $match)) {
00428                 $flushdisabled= FALSE;
00429             }
00430             else if (preg_match("/$this->re_DisabledFlush/ms", $contents, $match)) {
00431                 $flushdisabled= TRUE;
00432             }
00433             $startmin= sprintf('%02d', $match[1]);
00434             $starthour= sprintf('%02d', $match[2]);
00435             $flushdays= explode(',', $match[3]);
00436             
00437             return serialize(array($businessdaysdisabled, $holidaysdisabled, $flushdisabled,
00438                 $startmin, $starthour, $endmin, $endhour, $businessdays, $holidays, $flushdays));
00439         }
00440         return FALSE;
00441     }
00442 
00447     function GetCrontab()
00448     {
00449         exec('/usr/bin/crontab -l', $output, $retval);
00450         if ($retval === 0) {
00451             return implode("\n", $output);
00452         }
00453         ViewError(implode("\n", $output));
00454         cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'Failed listing crontab');
00455         return FALSE;
00456     }
00457 
00458     function DisableAfterHoursBusinessDays()
00459     {
00460         if ($this->CommentAfterHoursLine($this->re_BusinessDays)) {
00462             return $this->CommentAfterHoursLine($this->re_Flush);
00463         }
00464         return FALSE;
00465     }
00466 
00467     function EnableAfterHoursBusinessDays()
00468     {
00469         if ($this->UncommentAfterHoursLine($this->re_DisabledBusinessDays)) {
00471             return $this->UncommentAfterHoursLine($this->re_DisabledFlush);
00472         }
00473         return FALSE;
00474     }
00475 
00476     function DisableAfterHoursHolidays()
00477     {
00478         return $this->CommentAfterHoursLine($this->re_Holidays);
00479     }
00480 
00481     function EnableAfterHoursHolidays()
00482     {
00483         return $this->UncommentAfterHoursLine($this->re_DisabledHolidays);
00484     }
00485 
00495     function ApplyAfterHours($sh, $sm, $eh, $em, $businessdayslist, $holidayslist)
00496     {
00497         if (($contents= $this->GetCrontab()) !== FALSE) {
00498             // Remove leading zeros
00499             $starthour= $sh + 0;
00500             $startmin= $sm + 0;
00501             $endhour= $eh + 0;
00502             $endmin= $em + 0;
00503 
00504             $re_replace= "$endmin   $endhour    *   *   $businessdayslist   /sbin/pfctl -a AfterHours -f /etc/pf.conf.afterhours";
00505             if ($newcontents= preg_replace("/$this->re_BusinessDays/ms", $re_replace, $contents)) {
00506                 $contents= $newcontents;
00507             }
00508 
00509             $re_replace= "* *   *   *   $holidayslist   /sbin/pfctl -a AfterHours -f /etc/pf.conf.afterhours";
00510             if ($newcontents= preg_replace("/$this->re_Holidays/ms", $re_replace, $contents)) {
00511                 $contents= $newcontents;
00512             }
00513 
00514             $re_replace= "$startmin $starthour  *   *   $businessdayslist   /sbin/pfctl -a AfterHours -Fr";
00515             if ($newcontents= preg_replace("/$this->re_Flush/ms", $re_replace, $contents)) {
00516                 $contents= $newcontents;
00517             }
00518 
00519             if ($this->CheckAfterHoursOverlap($contents)) {
00520                 return $this->InstallNewCrontab($contents);
00521             }
00522         }
00523         return FALSE;
00524     }
00525 
00530     function CommentAfterHoursLine($re)
00531     {
00532         if (($contents= $this->GetCrontab()) !== FALSE) {
00533             if (preg_match("/$re/ms", $contents, $match)) {
00534                 if ($contents= preg_replace("/$re/ms", '#'.$match[0], $contents)) {
00535                     return $this->InstallNewCrontab($contents);
00536                 }
00537             }
00538         }
00539         return FALSE;
00540     }
00541 
00546     function UncommentAfterHoursLine($re)
00547     {
00548         if (($contents= $this->GetCrontab()) !== FALSE) {
00549             if (preg_match("/$re/ms", $contents, $match)) {
00550                 if ($contents= preg_replace("/$re/ms", substr($match[0], 1), $contents)) {
00551                     if ($this->CheckAfterHoursOverlap($contents)) {
00552                         return $this->InstallNewCrontab($contents);
00553                     }
00554                 }
00555             }
00556         }
00557         return FALSE;
00558     }
00559 
00567     function InstallNewCrontab($contents)
00568     {
00569         // PutFile() does not create the file if it does not exist already
00570         exec("/usr/bin/touch $this->tmpCrontab");
00571         // crontab complains without newline at the end of last line
00572         if ($this->PutFile($this->tmpCrontab, $contents.PHP_EOL)) {
00573             exec("/usr/bin/crontab $this->tmpCrontab", $output, $retval);
00574             if ($retval === 0) {
00575                 return TRUE;
00576             }
00577             ViewError(implode("\n", $output));
00578         }
00579         cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'Failed installing new crontab');
00580         return FALSE;
00581     }
00582 
00589     function CheckAfterHoursOverlap($contents)
00590     {
00591         $businessdays= array();
00592         if (preg_match("/$this->re_BusinessDays/ms", $contents, $match)) {
00593             $businessdays= explode(',', $match[3]);
00594         }
00595         $holidays= array();
00596         if (preg_match("/$this->re_Holidays/ms", $contents, $match)) {
00597             $holidays= explode(',', $match[1]);
00598         }
00599 
00600         if (count(array_intersect($businessdays, $holidays)) > 0) {
00601             ViewError(_('Business days and holidays cannot overlap.'));
00602             return FALSE;
00603         }
00604         return TRUE;
00605     }
00606     
00607     function ParseLogLine($logline, &$cols)
00608     {
00609         global $Re_Ip;
00610     
00611         // Sep 28 03:50:22.683986 rule 39/(match) pass in on em1: 10.0.0.11.40284 > 10.0.0.13.443: S 3537547021:3537547021(0) win 5840 <mss 1460,sackOK,timestamp 6440374[|tcp]> (DF)
00612         // Sep 27 14:32:21.715363 rule 37/(match) pass in on em1: 10.0.0.11.40546 > 10.0.0.13.22: S 2853072521:2853072521(0) win 5840 <mss 1460,sackOK,timestamp 3609332[|tcp]> (DF)
00613         // Sep 28 02:57:36.888668 rule 47/(match) pass out on em1: 10.0.0.13.16227 > 194.27.110.130.123: v4 client strat 0 poll 0 prec 0 [tos 0x10]
00614         // 
00615         // Sep 26 14:26:28.605638 rule 11/(match) block in on em1: 10.0.0.11.59299 > 239.255.255.250.1900: udp 132 (DF) [ttl 1]
00616         // 
00617         // Sep 28 03:50:20.124951 rule 11/(match) block in on em1: 10.0.0.11 > 224.0.0.22: igmp-2 [v2] (DF) [tos 0xc0] [ttl 1]
00618         // 
00619         // Sep 28 03:50:16.900084 rule 11/(match) block in on em1: 10.0.0.11.5353 > 224.0.0.251.5353: 0*- [0q] 7/0/0[|domain] (DF)
00620         // Sep 28 03:30:02.676705 rule 47/(match) pass out on em1: 10.0.0.13.41578 > 10.0.0.2.53: 61952+% [1au][|domain]
00621         // 
00622         // Sep 28 03:50:03.858844 rule 11/(match) block in on em0: 10.0.0.2.67 > 255.255.255.255.68: xid:0xf2ed6079 flags:0x8000 [|bootp] (DF)
00623         // Sep 28 03:50:03.858828 rule 11/(match) block in on em0: 0.0.0.0.68 > 255.255.255.255.67: xid:0xf2ed6079 [|bootp] [tos 0x10]
00624         // 
00625         // Sep 28 03:50:03.749086 rule 11/(match) block in on em1: fe80::21f:e2ff:fe61:969a > ff02::2: icmp6: router solicitation
00626         // Sep 28 03:49:54.705294 rule 11/(match) block in on em0: :: > ff02::1:ff61:969a: [|icmp6]
00627         // Sep 26 17:46:27.631418 rule 11/(match) block in on em0: :: > ff02::16: HBH icmp6: type-#143 [hlim 1]
00628 
00629         // Oct 18 05:16:52.230791 rule 11/(match) block in on em1: fe80::a00:27ff:fe4f:2af9.546 > ff02::1:2.547:dhcp6 solicit [hlim 1]
00630 
00631         $re_datetime= '(\w+\s+\d+)\s+(\d+:\d+:\d+)\.\d+';
00632         $re_rule= 'rule\s+([\w\.]+)\/\S+';
00633         $re_action= '(block|pass|match)';
00634         $re_direction= '(in|out)';
00635         $re_if= 'on\s+(\w+\d+):';
00636         $re_srcipport= "($Re_Ip|[\w:]+)(.(\d+)|)";
00637         $re_dstipport= "($Re_Ip|[\w:]+)(.(\d+)|)";
00638         $re_rest= '(.*)';
00639         
00640         $re= "/^$re_datetime\s+$re_rule\s+$re_action\s+$re_direction\s+$re_if\s+$re_srcipport\s+>\s+$re_dstipport:\s*$re_rest$/";
00641         if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00642             $cols['Date']= $match[1];
00643             $cols['Time']= $match[2];
00644             $cols['Rule']= $match[3];
00645             $cols['Act']= $match[4];
00646             $cols['Dir']= $match[5];
00647             $cols['If']= $match[6];
00648             $cols['SrcIP']= $match[7];
00649             $cols['SPort']= $match[9];
00650             $cols['DstIP']= $match[10];
00651             $cols['DPort']= $match[12];
00652             $rest= $match[13];
00653 
00654             $re= '/(tcp|udp|domain|icmp6|icmp\b|igmp\-2|igmp\b|bootp|\back\b|v4|dhcp\d*)/';
00655             if (preg_match($re, $rest, $match)) {
00656                 $cols['Type']= $match[1];
00657             }
00658             else {
00659                 $cols['Type']= 'other';
00660             }
00661             $cols['Log']= $rest;
00662             return TRUE;
00663         }
00664         return FALSE;
00665     }
00666     
00667     function GetDateRegexp($date)
00668     {
00669         global $MonthNames;
00670 
00671         if ($date['Month'] == '') {
00672             $re= '.*';
00673         }
00674         else {
00675             $re= $MonthNames[$date['Month']].'\s+';
00676             if ($date['Day'] == '') {
00677                 $re.= '.*';
00678             }
00679             else {
00680                 $re.= sprintf('%02d', $date['Day']);
00681             }
00682         }
00683         return $re;
00684     }
00685 
00686     function GetFileLineCount($file, $re= '')
00687     {
00688         global $TCPDUMP;
00689         
00690         $cmd= "$TCPDUMP $file";
00691         if ($re !== '') {
00692             $re= escapeshellarg($re);
00693             $cmd.= " | /usr/bin/grep -a -E $re";
00694         }
00695         $cmd.= ' | /usr/bin/wc -l';
00696         
00697         // OpenBSD wc returns with leading blanks
00698         return trim($this->RunShellCommand($cmd));
00699     }
00700     
00701     function GetLogs($file, $end, $count, $re= '')
00702     {
00703         global $TCPDUMP;
00704 
00705         $cmd= "$TCPDUMP $file";
00706         if ($re !== '') {
00707             $re= escapeshellarg($re);
00708             $cmd.= " | /usr/bin/grep -a -E $re";
00709         }
00710         $cmd.= " | /usr/bin/head -$end | /usr/bin/tail -$count";
00711         
00712         $lines= explode("\n", $this->RunShellCommand($cmd));
00713         
00714         $logs= array();
00715         foreach ($lines as $line) {
00716             unset($Cols);
00717             if ($this->ParseLogLine($line, $Cols)) {
00718                 $logs[]= $Cols;
00719             }
00720         }
00721         return serialize($logs);
00722     }
00723     
00724     function GetLiveLogs($file, $count, $re= '')
00725     {
00726         global $TCPDUMP;
00727         
00728         $cmd= "$TCPDUMP $file";
00729         if ($re !== '') {
00730             $re= escapeshellarg($re);
00731             $cmd.= " | /usr/bin/grep -a -E $re";
00732         }
00733         $cmd.= " | /usr/bin/tail -$count";
00734         
00735         $lines= explode("\n", $this->RunShellCommand($cmd));
00736         
00737         $logs= array();
00738         foreach ($lines as $line) {
00739             if ($this->ParseLogLine($line, $Cols)) {
00740                 $logs[]= $Cols;
00741             }
00742         }
00743         return serialize($logs);
00744     }

00788     function GetPfwPfTest($pfhost, $file)
00789     {
00790         exec("$this->PF_PATH/bin/packetfilter.sh $pfhost -t $file", $output, $retval);
00791         // Return value of this shell script is not 0, do not use $retval === 0 here
00792         if ($retval) {
00793             return implode("\n", $output);
00794         }
00795         return FALSE;
00796     }
